Segment.name: CR4
Segment.comment: To supply information regarding certification of medical necessity for enteral or parenteral nutrition therapy

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response

Field.name: CertificationTypeCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the type of certification

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode1
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode2
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: NonVisitCode
Field.comment: Code indicating on what a medical evaluation is based, when not based on a physician's visit

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode3
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode4
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: Height
Field.comment: Vertical dimension of an object measured when the object is in the upright position

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode5
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: Description1
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: NutrientAdministrationMethodCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the method used to administer nutrient to a patient

Field.name: NutrientAdministrationTechniqueCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the technique used to administer nutrient to a patient

Field.name: Description2
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content
